dcterms:creator: Nick Paape
Joost A.W.M. van Eekelen

dcterms:description: A case study focusing on the design of a poultry processing system, specifically analyzing the distribution of fillets of different weights to suitable downstream destinations.
dcterms:title: Poultry Processing System Case Study

dcterms:creator: M. Saravanan
S. Ganesh Kumar
dcterms:description: A benchmark problem used to analyze the scalability of optimization algorithms in flexible manufacturing systems, specifically focusing on loop layout problems.
dcterms:title: Loop Layout Benchmark Problem

dcterms:creator: Nick Paape
Joost A.W.M. van Eekelen
Michel A. Reniers
dcterms:description: A specification language for automated design space exploration of production systems, providing a framework for generating feasible designs.
dcterms:title: Design Space of Production Systems
